backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing vehicles, reviews, contact forms, user profiles, and admin-controlled currency/cost settings with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific frontend files to features, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, lazy-loaded vehicle detail page, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormModal: Modal for submitting contact forms with validation, state handling, and backend submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/ContactRequestsT: Displays, sorts, and deletes contact form submissions with table and mobile views.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a minimal footer container with removed content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Handles authentication, admin settings, navigation, and modals for currency and cost settings.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Provides a fullscreen lightbox with keyboard, swipe, and arrow navigation plus image prefetching.
Prefetches upcoming images using ProgressiveImage for smoother gallery navigation.
frontend/src/components/LazyImage.tsx: Implements lazy loading for images using IntersectionObserver with a loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal requesting the user's name and saves it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressiveImage: Loads images progressively with preview, WebP support, lazy loading, and prefetch options.
Modal for editing a review with text fields, image management, and upload progress, submitting changes via useEditReview.
Modal for submitting a new review, handling form fields, image uploads with previews, and sending data through useSubmitReview.
frontend/src/components/VehicleCard.tsx: Displays a vehicle preview card with main details, image loading, cost calculation, and prefetching data on hover.
frontend/src/components/VehicleFormModal: Form modal for creating or editing a vehicle, supporting image uploads, deletion, duplication, and cost calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, admin status, currency settings, vehicles, and reviews with caching and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS themes, color variables, dark mode overrides, and utility classes like gradients and text shadows.
frontend/src/lib/priceCalculator.ts: Implements vehicle cost calculation utilities including customs duty, price breakdown, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders vehicle catalog with filtering, pagination, infinite scroll, admin actions, and modals for adding or contacting.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: Displays landing page with hero section, reviews carousel, and admin-editable review modals with lazy loading.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed vehicle info with image gallery, swipe navigation, price breakdown, and admin editing.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Vehicle, Review, and ContactFormSubmission used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature descriptions, known issues, and current architectural state for the carâ€‘listing site.
